page.title: 14ARMED FORCES
page.content: The area is used for low flying exercises by the{R.A.F. Many narrow roads e.g. the road from Dousland to Walkhampton is{signposted as too narrow for heavy military vehicles. {Marines }from Bickleigh often use the area for endurance training. On Peek hill there is a{nuclear {observation post}excavated deep into the hill top with accommodation deep inside the hill.This is meant to signal back details of a nuclear attack on Plymouth.It is not permanently manned and is usually padlocked from the outside. No secret is made of this place.
